description: Identify the year with the highest gross margin as a share of sales.
Determine the gross margin as a share of sales for the year 2005.
Compute the average gross margin as a share of sales from 2002 to 2018.
Find any year where the gross margin significantly deviates from the surrounding years.
Determine if there is a general upward or downward trend in the gross margin from 2002 to 2018.
Identify the range of gross margin values over the given years.
What is the gross margin as a share of sales in 2010?
Order the years 2005, 2010, and 2015 by their gross margin as a share of sales from highest to lowest.
Identify any clusters of years with similar gross margin values.
Determine the percentage of years with a gross margin above 0.26.
